name: SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint
desc: The type of task for which you are using speech recognition.

items.name: case dictation
items.desc: A task that uses captured speech for text entry.

items.name: case search
items.desc: A task that uses captured speech to specify seach terms.

items.name: case confirmation
items.desc: A task that uses captured speech for short, confirmation-style requests.
